description: THE BROS ARE BACK with a truly eventful doubleheader and questionable decisions about what they put in their bodies.
title: Battle Bros Season Four, Chapter IX: We’re Great at This Game

description:
Starting a new period brings with it a confusing plethora of questions on the miniatures themselves - who makes appropriate models? Which range has the most dynamic figures? The best pose variety? The best price-point? Are there any plastic kits? What 3d print options are currently available? What figures mix well together? And so on. 

Well, we've done the hard work for you. This article is a run down of the existing model ranges for infantry and cavalry figures in 28mm scale suitable for WW1, and scale comparison pics for those ranges that we own here at Goonhammer towers
title: Goonhammer Historicals: The Great War – A Collector’s Guide to 28mm

description: It’s another big week for Age of Sigmar fourth edition, with the release of points for all the models detailed in last week’s faction packs along with new lists and rules for fourth edition’s Regiments of Renown and Armies of Renown. We’ve broken the points overview down into four articles, one for each Grand Alliance: […]
title: Welcome to Age of Sigmar Fourth Edition – Points and Renown

description: Goonhammer has received some of the launch content, via Games Workshop, to create this review and overview. Over the coming weeks, and with the benefit of having played dozens of games, we will be having faction experts provide insight into how they are building and running lists with these factions. For this overview we’re looking […]
